spec_data.Name: rubygem-bundler
spec_data.Description:
Bundler manages an application's dependencies through its entire life, across
many machines, systematically and repeatably.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 10:54:24 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Library and utilities to manage a Ruby application's gem dependencies
